price: Gyesε Iblis, ͻyεε ahomasoͻ, na ͻka boniayεfoͻ no ho.
arabic: إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: illā ib'līsa is'takbara wakāna mina al-kāfirīna
